description: Let your kid explore with the greatest of ease.The GreatShield Chalkee Stylus for kids is designed to make learning with touch screen devices fun and easy.  Made with a comfortable soft touch design that allows kids to easily handle and hold the stylus while having fun.  The Chalkee is well balanced and thicker than most styli to make gripping easier for young learners.  The stylus is extra sturdy and has a durable soft rubber tip which helps to prevent scratches, fingerprints and other damage to your touch screen device.  The GreatShield Chalkee Stylus is the perfect stylus for your kids to play with while learning to use touch screen devices.• Compatible with most tablets, touch screen learning devices and smartphones• Works with millions of Apps• Helps young learners to write, draw, drag and point• Chalkee size is 4 inches long & 3/4 inch thickWARNING!• CHOKING HAZARD - Small parts• Not for children under 3 yrs.
title: GreatShield Chalkee Kid Friendly Stylus for Touchscreen Devices (Blue)
